title: Road in a Mountain Landscape
medium:
Recto: Brush and watercolor, white gouache, pen and ink on tan wove paper.
Verso: Graphite on tan wove paper.
description:
Recto: Horizontal and oblique view of a road, between rocks and trees with a crag-like mountain rising in the left background.
Verso: Mountainous landscape with a house in the center.
name: Drawing
